Interface TranslationLoader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTranslationLoader, ConfigurationLoader, FileConfigurationLoader
    public interface TranslationLoader

   throws IOException
        Loads messages from the file or the directory.
        Throws:

      • isLoaded

        boolean isLoaded()
        Returns whether this loader has succeeded in loading messages from the file or the directory.
        Returns:
        true if successful, false otherwise

      • register

        boolean register​(@NotNull
                 @NotNull TranslationRegistry registry)
        Registers messages to the TranslationRegistry.
        Parameters:
        registry - the registry to register messages
        Returns:
        true if the registration was successful, false otherwise

        @NotNull
@NotNull @UnmodifiableView Map<String,​String> getMessageMap()
        Gets the map of messages based on key-value.
        Returns:
        the message map

      • getVersion

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getVersion()
        Gets the version of the translation.

        If this loader is not loaded, this method will return an empty string.

        Returns:
        the version of the translation

      • setVersion

        void setVersion​(@NotNull
                @NotNull String newVersion)
        Sets the version of this translation.
        Parameters:
        newVersion - the new version

      • merge

        void merge​(@NotNull
           @NotNull TranslationLoader other)
        Merges the other TranslationLoader into this loader.

        If there are message keys that does not exist in this loader, they will be added from another loader.

        Parameters:
        other - the other TranslationLoader
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - the other TranslationLoader is not loaded

      • isModified

        boolean isModified()
        Checks if this loader is modified by merge(TranslationLoader) method.
        Returns:
        true if this loader is modified, false otherwise

      • save

        void save()
   throws IOException
        Saves messages to the file if isModified() returns true.
        Throws:
        IOException - if I/O error occurred
